definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: It's ideal for autumn wear—gray flannels with blue stripes.
sentences.chinese: 灰色蓝条法兰绒，是秋天理想的料子。

sentences.english: Pieces of material of different breadths .
The material has gone a funny colour.
sentences.chinese: 这料子的颜色变得奇怪了。

sentences.english: What options do I have for  fabric?
The material is one meter wide. 1.9 meters would be quite enough.
sentences.chinese: 让我看看，这料子一米宽，五尺半就足够了。

sentences.english: I want to buy enough cloth to make a suit.
sentences.chinese: 我想买够做一身衣服的料子。

sentences.english: Blend fabric of wool and cotton is ideal material.
sentences.chinese: 棉毛混纺是理想的料子。

sentences.english: The folds in the material will soon wear out.
sentences.chinese: 那料子上的褶子穿穿就很快会没有了。

sentences.english: This material is a mixture fabric of pure wool and plush.
sentences.chinese: 这种料子是纯羊毛与长毛绒的混纺织品。

sentences.english: Her bodice was made of crinkly material.
sentences.chinese: 她的紧身马甲是用起皱的料子做的。

sentences.english: I have enough material to curtain all the windows.
sentences.chinese: 我有足够的料子把所有的窗户都挂上窗帘。

sentences.english: This material will make up into three dresses.
sentences.chinese: 这块料子可以裁制三件衣服。

sentences.english: The overalls I was wearing were of very thick cloth and no serious damage had been done.
sentences.chinese: 我穿的工装裤料子很厚实，我的损伤不算严重。

sentences.english: She was dressed in rich materials-satins, and lace, and silks-all of white.
sentences.chinese: 她穿的都是贵重料子，绸缎花边一应俱全，全身雪白。

sentences.english: I have enough material to make two dresses.
sentences.chinese: 我有够做两件连衣裙的料子。

definition: sth of good quality/good person (usu. in the negative)/(Tw) delicious food
sheep-fat white jade, a type of jade
